name: Green Tea
description: Refreshing, antioxidant-rich green tea that brings natural energy and calm in every sip.

name: Black Tea
description: Bold, full-bodied black tea that awakens your senses with rich flavor and natural vitality.

name: Milk Tea
description: Creamy, comforting milk tea that blends rich flavor with a perfect balance of sweetness and warmth.

name: Masala Tea
description: Aromatic masala tea infused with bold spices, offering warmth, energy, and a touch of tradition in every sip.

name: White Tea
description: Delicate, naturally sweet white tea with subtle floral notes that refreshes and soothes in every sip.

name: Normal Tea
description: Classic, everyday tea with a smooth taste that refreshes and energizes in every cup.
